LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.label: pot noodle dispenser
LanguageData.NutrientPasteDispenser.description: A pot noodle dispenser, it's basically just adding hot water to dehydrated noodles to make a meal, efficient and great on a cold day.
LanguageData.Hopper.description: Holds resources for use by machines like pot noodle dispensers.
LanguageData.MealNutrientPaste.label: pot noodle
LanguageData.MealNutrientPaste.description: A synthetic mixture of noodles and flavour powder with some green bits nobody can identify. A weirdly satisfying meal.
